1083853171678531584.text: The passively secure pairwise LSSS multiplication is done using Paillier encryption

1083852967961227264.text: But we can check correctness using ZKPoK between the secret sharing and the El Gamal ciphertexts

1083852756157222912.text: Trick is to work in parallel using additive secret sharing, but then we have prolems of correctness!!!

1083852481250045953.text: #realworldcrypto ZKPoKs for ElGamal encryption in the exponent are easy, trouble is you cannot decrypt!!!
